introductionContent.text: These are the proceedings of the NAACL-HLT 2007 Doctoral Consortium.
Ten participants were selected from a total of eighteen applicants based on submission quality, advisor recommendation, and expected completion date for the PhD degree.

The goals of this event are to provide these senior Ph.D. students with the opportunity to discuss and explore their research and career objectives with a panel of established researchers in the fields of natural language processing, speech technology, and information retrieval, and to develop the skills necessary to effectively communicate their research in preparation for future job talks.
